title: Update username display to 8-character alphanumeric format

requirements.summary: Update all frontend components that display usernames to render the new 8-character alphanumeric format without modification
acceptanceCriteria: All username displays across the application show the 8-character format
Usernames are rendered exactly as received from the backend without client-side transformation
Username display is consistent across all UI components

file_operations.description: Update the username display to render the 8-character alphanumeric format received from the backend without any client-side transformation or 'Anon' prefix. Ensure the sender prop is displayed exactly as provided.

Update the username editing functionality to display and handle the new 8-character alphanumeric format. Remove any 'Anon' prefix logic and ensure the username is rendered exactly as received from the backend. Update any character limit validation if needed to accommodate the 8-character format.

Review and update any username display logic in the chat area component to ensure usernames are rendered in the 8-character alphanumeric format without modification. Verify that sender information passed to child components maintains the backend format.

Review query hooks that fetch or manipulate username data to ensure no client-side transformation is applied. Verify that sender and username fields are passed through unchanged from the backend response.
